name: places/ChIJtzT1KB30wokRsiwYDnynFAY

displayName.text: R G Ortiz Funeral Home Inc

adrFormatAddress: 4425 Broadway, New York, NY 10040-4009, USA

originalText.text: My father passed away on 11/17/23. Immediately after his passing, I came to this funeral home as I had been there before and it’s not far from my home. My family and I had a wonderful experience. My dad looked extremely handsome and everyone gave us wonderful service. They were very thoughtful and helpful and answered any questions we may have.  The priest that did the service for my father did an amazing job as well. Although I have read bad reviews, my family and I did not have a negative experience.

text.text: My father passed away on 11/17/23. Immediately after his passing, I came to this funeral home as I had been there before and it’s not far from my home. originalText.text: The staff is rude, slow and show very little empathy to clients.  With all the money they charge, you would think they throw in "empathy" and "courtesy" as part of the service.  The place needs serious updating in all things aesthetics and may I suggest a receptionist or answering service.  6 calls should not be norm before you get a live person. They are in the wrong service industry...

originalText.text: If I can give this place 0 stars I would. First of all the monster working in the first office should be ashamed. She clearly does not know what it’s like to lose a loved one. Also she clearly knows we are not catholics and shoving catholic pictures rudely in our face. I did not catch her name but it’s was an overweight lady maybe in her 30s/40s she was working on Saturday Nov 18 she needs to be fired. She was extremely rude and needs to find another job but not working in a funeral home. I will post this everywhere to make sure people chose another place for these services.

originalText.text: This place should not  exist! My husband passed Sept.2022. H was to be cremated. however, They managed to lose him. I have not received an apology, noy a word from them. Thats why we now have a lawsuit against them, and I'm not the only one. Also the new york city A.G. is looking into criminal charges aganist them. Other people have come forward to report  other atrocities. Do not under any circumstances entrust your loved one to these people.

originalText.text: This place is playing with people grieve and it’s clear they don’t care. I do not recommend this place. They were supposed to send my mother's body to our country. They lied to us about the arrival time, knowing that they do not have this type of service at the airport or funeral home in my country too late at night, yet they sent it late and on a weekend, the service there was from 9am to 2pm and the corpse arrived at 135pm. At the airport they made an exception to give us the body. This is not just a game to save money since you are charging us in full for a service.
